headline: Bernhard Capital-Backed Delta Utilities Completes Acquisition of Entergy's Natural Gas Distribution Businesses in New Orleans and East Baton Rouge Parish
summary: Delta Utilities, a Bernhard Capital Partners portfolio company, today announced it has acquired Entergy's two regulated natural gas utilities serving communities throughout New Orleans and East Baton Rouge Parish.

raw.headline: Bernhard Capital-Backed Delta Utilities Completes Acquisition of Entergy's Natural Gas Distribution Businesses in New Orleans and East Baton Rouge Parish
raw.summary: Delta Utilities, a Bernhard Capital Partners portfolio company, today announced it has acquired Entergy's two regulated natural gas utilities serving communities throughout New Orleans and East Baton Rouge Parish.

headline: Entergy completes sale of its natural gas distribution business to Delta Utilities
summary: Entergy today announced the successful completion of the previously disclosed and approved sale of its natural gas distribution business to Delta Utilities, a company backed by Bernhard Capital Partners and based in New Orleans. Effective immediately, Delta Utilities assumes responsibility for the day-to-day service and gas distribution operations formerly managed by Entergy.

raw.headline: Entergy completes sale of its natural gas distribution business to Delta Utilities
raw.summary: Entergy today announced the successful completion of the previously disclosed and approved sale of its natural gas distribution business to Delta Utilities, a company backed by Bernhard Capital Partners and based in New Orleans. Effective immediately, Delta Utilities assumes responsibility for the day-to-day service and gas distribution operations formerly managed by Entergy.

headline: Surging Clean Energy Demand Sparks Renewed Focus on Nuclear Stocks
summary: For investors aiming to build a nuclear-focused portfolio, companies like Entergy, Dominion Energy, and Constellation Energy present compelling opportunities.
